devdoc.details: Smart contract for managing interactions with a Balancer LBP.

getSwapEnabled().details: Tells whether swaps are enabled or not for the LBP

initializeLBP(address).details: Subtracts the fee, deploys the LBP and adds liquidity to it.

params._amounts: Array containing two parameters in order of: 1. The amounts of project token to be added as liquidity to the LBP. 2. The amounts of funding token to be added as liquidity to the LBP.
params._beneficiary: The address that receives the feePercentage.
params._endWeights: Array containing two parametes in order of: 1. The end weight for the project token in the LBP. 2. The end weight for the funding token in the LBP.
params._fees: Array containing two parameters in order of: 1. Percentage of fee paid for every swap in the LBP. 2. Percentage of fee paid to the _beneficiary for providing the service of the LBP Manager.
params._metadata: IPFS Hash of the LBP creation wizard information.
params._startTimeEndTime: Array containing two parameters in order of: 1. Start time for the LBP. 2. End time for the LBP.
params._startWeights: Array containing two parametes in order of: 1. The start weight for the project token in the LBP. 2. The start weight for the funding token in the LBP.
params._tokenList: Array containing two addresses in order of: 1. The address of the project token being distributed. 2. The address of the funding token being exchanged for the project token.

projectTokensRequired().details: Get required amount of project tokens to cover for fees and the actual LBP.

removeLiquidity(address).details: Exit pool or remove liquidity from pool.

params._receiver: Address of the liquidity receiver, after exiting the LBP.

params._metadata: LBP wizard contract metadata, that is an IPFS Hash.

params._receiver: Address of the BPT tokens receiver.

devdoc.title: LBPManager contract.
